description: Ifa is a renowned Saurianveterinarian from the Flower-Feather Clan. He is friends with Ororonand often delivers vegetables to Citlalion his behalf. When Ororon was avoiding her during his collaboration with Capitano, Citlali asked Ifa to deliver the gem replacement for the talisman that keeps his soul stable. This was actually a ploy to copy Ororon's memories onto the old gem, but Ifa, not knowing anything, agreed to do the delivery without asking any questions. Cacucuis a Qucusaurusassistant of Ifa's at his clinic and also considers himself Ifa's "brother." Cacucu learned several of Ifa's catchphrases and despite fully understanding the human language, can only repeat these catchphrases to communicate due to the limited nature of his vocal cords.

## Basic Information
- Element: Anemo
- Weapon: Catalyst
- Region: Natlan
- Model: Tall Male

## Description
Ifa is a renowned Saurianveterinarian from the Flower-Feather Clan. He is friends with Ororonand often delivers vegetables to Citlalion his behalf. When Ororon was avoiding her during his collaboration with Capitano, Citlali asked Ifa to deliver the gem replacement for the talisman that keeps his soul stable. This was actually a ploy to copy Ororon's memories onto the old gem, but Ifa, not knowing anything, agreed to do the delivery without asking any questions. Cacucuis a Qucusaurusassistant of Ifa's at his clinic and also considers himself Ifa's "brother." Cacucu learned several of Ifa's catchphrases and despite fully understanding the human language, can only repeat these catchphrases to communicate due to the limited nature of his vocal cords.

Does not include synthetic relatives.Sibling:Traveler's Sibling English Aether:Zach Aguilar Lumine:Sarah Miller-Crews Chinese Aether:Luyin (鹿喑)Lumine:Yanning (宴宁)Japanese Aether:Horie Shun (堀江瞬)Lumine:Yuuki Aoi (悠木碧)Korean Aether:Lee Kyeong-tae (이경태)Lumine:Lee Sae-ah (이새아)Categories Playable Characters The Traveleris the playable protagonist of Genshin Impact. In the opening cutscene, twin siblings from another world travel through the universe, until Asmodayblocked their path. The player gets to choose either Aether(male) or Lumine(female) as the Traveler and the Traveler's Siblingbecomes captured. Their power to travel is sealed, leaving them stranded on Teyvat. They save Paimonby fishing her out of the water and she accompanies them as their new travel companion. Together they set out on a journey to find The Sevenand reunite with the Traveler's lost sibling. Although players can choose the name they want to be referred by, the Traveler's Siblingrefers to the Traveler by their real name, regardless of their custom name. In Natlan, the Traveler also gains the Ancient Name TMN("TMN,"Tumaini).

sections.Elemental Alignment: At the beginning of the game and in The Crux Clashin Chapter II: Prologue -Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves, the Traveler is "unaligned," a special elemental state exclusive to them. When unaligned, the color of the Traveler's "vision" and background when they are selected in the Character Menuis gray. Although the Traveler's Profile lists their Constellationproperly as Viator/Viatrix, attempting to open the Constellation tab will show a blank screen with "Constellation Unavailable" in the bottom-right corner. When unaligned, the Traveler has only one talent, Normal Attack:Past Memories. When unaligned, screens that show character cards with their elements show a gray "no" symbol (🚫︎) in the place of the element symbol. Shortly after the beginning of the game, the Traveler will unlock their Anemo Talents and Constellation by resonating with the first Statue of The Sevenin Mondstadt. They can resonate with any other Statue of The Seven they find and change their element to match the statue's element.See Teyvatfor each region's element. However, the Traveler does not immediately gain the Pyroelement upon resonating with a Statue of The Seven in Natlan, due to corrupted Ley Linesin the region. They instead unlock their abilities during Where All Hopes Liein Chapter V: Act V -Incandescent Ode of Resurrection, and are able to properly resonate with Natlan's Statues of the Seven following this quest.
sections.Availability: The Traveleris obtained at the start of the game and is not featured in any Wishes.

# Traveler

## Basic Information
- Weapon: Sword
- Region: Natlan
- Model: Medium Male

## Description
Traveler Descender Card (Aether)Card (Lumine)In-Game (Aether)In-Game (Lumine)Quality Weapon Sword Element Model Type None Aether:Medium Male Lumine:Medium Female Bio Relatives Voice Actors Real Name(Aether Text for male Traveler/Lumine Text for female Traveler)Birthday Player's Choice Constel­lation Viator(male)Viatrix(female)Affil­i­a­tion—Release Date September 28, 20205 years, 3 months ago Bio logical Family members related by blood lineage (consanguinity) or marriage. Does not include synthetic relatives.Sibling:Traveler's Sibling English Aether:Zach Aguilar Lumine:Sarah Miller-Crews Chinese Aether:Luyin (鹿喑)Lumine:Yanning (宴宁)Japanese Aether:Horie Shun (堀江瞬)Lumine:Yuuki Aoi (悠木碧)Korean Aether:Lee Kyeong-tae (이경태)Lumine:Lee Sae-ah (이새아)Categories Playable Characters The Traveleris the playable protagonist of Genshin Impact. In the opening cutscene, twin siblings from another world travel through the universe, until Asmodayblocked their path. The player gets to choose either Aether(male) or Lumine(female) as the Traveler and the Traveler's Siblingbecomes captured. Their power to travel is sealed, leaving them stranded on Teyvat. They save Paimonby fishing her out of the water and she accompanies them as their new travel companion. Together they set out on a journey to find The Sevenand reunite with the Traveler's lost sibling. Although players can choose the name they want to be referred by, the Traveler's Siblingrefers to the Traveler by their real name, regardless of their custom name. In Natlan, the Traveler also gains the Ancient Name TMN("TMN,"Tumaini).

## Ascensions and Stats
Toggle Ascension Materials Total Cost(0✦ → 6✦)

## Elemental Alignment
At the beginning of the game and in The Crux Clashin Chapter II: Prologue -Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves, the Traveler is "unaligned," a special elemental state exclusive to them. When unaligned, the color of the Traveler's "vision" and background when they are selected in the Character Menuis gray. Although the Traveler's Profile lists their Constellationproperly as Viator/Viatrix, attempting to open the Constellation tab will show a blank screen with "Constellation Unavailable" in the bottom-right corner. When unaligned, the Traveler has only one talent, Normal Attack:Past Memories. When unaligned, screens that show character cards with their elements show a gray "no" symbol (🚫︎) in the place of the element symbol. Shortly after the beginning of the game, the Traveler will unlock their Anemo Talents and Constellation by resonating with the first Statue of The Sevenin Mondstadt. They can resonate with any other Statue of The Seven they find and change their element to match the statue's element.See Teyvatfor each region's element. However, the Traveler does not immediately gain the Pyroelement upon resonating with a Statue of The Seven in Natlan, due to corrupted Ley Linesin the region. They instead unlock their abilities during Where All Hopes Liein Chapter V: Act V -Incandescent Ode of Resurrection, and are able to properly resonate with Natlan's Statues of the Seven following this quest.

## Availability
The Traveleris obtained at the start of the game and is not featured in any Wishes.

Wonderland Manekin Manekin Manekina Quality Weapon Sword Element Model Type None Manekin:Medium Male Manekina:Medium Female Bio Voice Actors How to Obtain Miliastra Wonderland Release Date October 22, 20252 months ago English Manekin (Voice C):Edward Stoneguard Japanese Manekin (Voice A):Matsuoka Yoshitsugu (松岡禎丞)Manekin (Voice B):Uchida Yuma (内田雄馬)Manekin (Voice C):Midorikawa Hikaru (緑川光)Manekina (Voice A):Minase Inori (水瀬いのり)Manekina (Voice B):Kanemoto Hisako (金元寿子)Manekina (Voice C):Horie Yui (堀江由衣)Categories Playable Characters The Wonderland Manekinis a playablecharacterin Genshin Impact, serving as the playable character of the Miliastra Wonderlandgameplay mode. After unlocking Miliastra Wonderland, players will gain access to two versions of the Manekin:Manekin(male) and Manekina(female). The Manekins can be named, customized with Cosmetic Plans, and used in Miliastra Wonderland and Teyvat. In Miliastra Wonderland, players can freely swap between the Manekin and the Manekina at any time. In Teyvat, players have both Manekins simultaneously as separate characters but they cannot both be used in the same team. The Manekin can be used in the open world and most domains, but not in gameplay modes such as the Spiral Abyss,Imaginarium Theater, and Stygian Onslaught. Theirelementis set to the Traveler's current element.

## Ascensions and Stats
Manekin requires no Character EXP Materials,Character Ascension Materials, or Morato level up or ascend. After reaching certain Wonderland Levels in Miliastra Wonderland, Manekin can be ascended to the next ascension, automatically leveling up to the maximum level of that ascension.

## Talents
Manekin talents require no Character Talent Materialor Mora to level up. They are automatically raised to their highest level for the Manekin's ascension as you ascend the Manekin.

## Constellation
This character doesn't have Constellations.

## Availability
Manekin is obtained from Miliastra Wonderland and is not featured in any Wishes.

full_text:
# Dainsleif

## Basic Information
- Weapon: Sword
- Region: Khaenri'ah

## Description
Dainsleif is the former knight captain of the Royal Guard of Khaenri'ah. However, he failed to prevent the destruction of Khaenri'ah 500 years ago. A curse of immortality was placed upon him so that he would forever wander Teyvat. Dainsleif was announced to be an upcoming playable character on September 27, 2020, in thestreamcelebrating the global release of Genshin Impact, although he is not expected to be released for a significant amount of time. The listed name of his Vision's element, as announced on his Chinese Character Card, is a set of indecipherable symbols ().

## Official Introduction
The confluence between the past and future. The original calamityhad been overturned, yetthe island in the skyset the earth to burn. Chalk pursues gold, in this time inopportune, theeclipseis swallowed by thecrimson moon. The future must atone for bygone mistakes, as the bond familiar falters and breaks— of the same blood, elders and the youth... Such is the cycle of the world, in truth. Dain, what is that strand of blonde hair to you? Someone you must kill? Or the object of your penitence? —A self-proclaimed prophet

sections.Official Introduction: For new members joining the Lightkeepers, few things are more fortunate than having a leader like Illuga. Though Lightkeepers witness the tragic aftermath of the Wild Hunt's rampages every day, and the atmosphere in their quarters can often grow heavy and oppressive, Illuga somehow remains positive. He not only manages all tasks efficiently but also offers careful, thoughtful support to his teammates. Walking beside him, it feels as if even the lantern in your hand glows a little warmer. Some people wonder why someone like him hasn't chosen to work in logistics, but instead insists on going to the dangerous frontlines. Without unwavering resolve and strong inner drive, even optimistic smiles will one day be drowned by the purple-black despair. Yet whenever they hear Illuga recite the Lightkeepers' oath with conviction, such doubts vanish from their hearts — undoubtedly, beneath his gentle exterior burns a fierce, blazing fire. What are the ideals and beliefs of the Lightkeepers? This is the question newcomers ask most often, and each Lightkeeper would answer differently. Yet there is always a common thread in these answers — protection and salvation, steadfastness and unwavering resolve. They speak of a bright outcome, or a noble vision, grand and magnificent beyond measure. But Illuga desires little beyond defeating the Wild Hunt, for he realizes that, in its current state,Piramidaalready embodies that ideal. Only those who have endured the nightmare can truly grasp how precious the daylight is. What he wishes to protect is simple — the present.

Does not include synthetic relatives.Parent:Nikita English Jonathon Ha Chinese Yu Tou (昱头)Japanese Umeda Shuuichirou (梅田修一朗)Korean Hwang Dong-hyeon (황동현)Additional Titles Categories Member of the investigation squad, the Nightmare Orioles Upcoming Characters Illugais an upcoming playable Geocharacter in Genshin Impact. A young and upcoming man part of the Lightkeepersas a Ratnik and is the adoptive son of Nikita, the current Starshyna.

## Official Introduction
For new members joining the Lightkeepers, few things are more fortunate than having a leader like Illuga. Though Lightkeepers witness the tragic aftermath of the Wild Hunt's rampages every day, and the atmosphere in their quarters can often grow heavy and oppressive, Illuga somehow remains positive. He not only manages all tasks efficiently but also offers careful, thoughtful support to his teammates. Walking beside him, it feels as if even the lantern in your hand glows a little warmer. Some people wonder why someone like him hasn't chosen to work in logistics, but instead insists on going to the dangerous frontlines. Without unwavering resolve and strong inner drive, even optimistic smiles will one day be drowned by the purple-black despair. Yet whenever they hear Illuga recite the Lightkeepers' oath with conviction, such doubts vanish from their hearts — undoubtedly, beneath his gentle exterior burns a fierce, blazing fire. What are the ideals and beliefs of the Lightkeepers? This is the question newcomers ask most often, and each Lightkeeper would answer differently. Yet there is always a common thread in these answers — protection and salvation, steadfastness and unwavering resolve. They speak of a bright outcome, or a noble vision, grand and magnificent beyond measure. But Illuga desires little beyond defeating the Wild Hunt, for he realizes that, in its current state,Piramidaalready embodies that ideal. Only those who have endured the nightmare can truly grasp how precious the daylight is. What he wishes to protect is simple — the present.

description: Zibai White Horse's Fleeting Spring Card Quality Weapon Sword Element Geo Bio Voice Actors Constel­lation Equa Alba Region Liyue Affil­i­a­tions Eight Adepts Celestia How to Obtain Event Wish — Harmonious Abundance Featured Upcoming:Runs in 19 days Release Date February 03, 2026In 2 weeks English Laura Welsh Chinese Mace Japanese Fukuen Misato (福圓美里)Korean Chun Song-e (천송이)Additional Titles Categories The White Horse Adeptus from Liyue's legends Upcoming Characters Angels Zibai(Chinese:兹白Zībái) is an upcoming playable Geocharacter in Genshin Impact.

sections.Official Introduction: Among the people of Liyue, tales of the Adeptiare ever-abundant. Like the leisurelyadeptus of the cloudswho dispelled droughts with nourishing rain in the "Full Record of Pristine Pavilion," and the Golden-Winged Kingwho purged plagues and banished pestilence in "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti." They are all beings of immense power, guardians of peace in every corner of the land, who the people hold in reverence and awe. And there was, in particular, a certain White Horse Adeptus, whose trail pervades many a book and folktale. Some say she became a steed as white as snow and, in the days of the Archon War, aided Rex Lapisin attaining supremacy over the mortal realm. Others whisper that her eyes, like amber touched with gold, hold the power to gaze through the desolate wastelands of time itself. Still others claim she has always lived on themoon, listening to the wishes of mortals, and keeping watch over the world of flickering lights below. Yet, amidst all these different accounts, none could truly capture her visage, nor paint a likeness of her form. Whether amidst gentle tea-time chatter, or in debates pouring out over ink-filled scrolls, each view was a glimpse through a keyhole — catching naught but fragments, never the full picture. In any case, she was as a shard of blessed light, a wild goose upon the snow, whose footprints vanish with the morning. Still, her yesteryears linger in the mortal dust, and her tale awaits its dawn into the world of the waking.

## Official Introduction
Among the people of Liyue, tales of the Adeptiare ever-abundant. Like the leisurelyadeptus of the cloudswho dispelled droughts with nourishing rain in the "Full Record of Pristine Pavilion," and the Golden-Winged Kingwho purged plagues and banished pestilence in "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti." They are all beings of immense power, guardians of peace in every corner of the land, who the people hold in reverence and awe. And there was, in particular, a certain White Horse Adeptus, whose trail pervades many a book and folktale. Some say she became a steed as white as snow and, in the days of the Archon War, aided Rex Lapisin attaining supremacy over the mortal realm. Others whisper that her eyes, like amber touched with gold, hold the power to gaze through the desolate wastelands of time itself. Still others claim she has always lived on themoon, listening to the wishes of mortals, and keeping watch over the world of flickering lights below. Yet, amidst all these different accounts, none could truly capture her visage, nor paint a likeness of her form. Whether amidst gentle tea-time chatter, or in debates pouring out over ink-filled scrolls, each view was a glimpse through a keyhole — catching naught but fragments, never the full picture. In any case, she was as a shard of blessed light, a wild goose upon the snow, whose footprints vanish with the morning. Still, her yesteryears linger in the mortal dust, and her tale awaits its dawn into the world of the waking.
